messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2801
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/6/03 7:17:23 PM Eastern Standard Time, bluelotus@att.net ... I think you re writing styles are similar and that may have caused Tia some
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/6/03 7:17:23 PM Eastern Standard Time, bluelotus@...
writes:

> Now, why would someone ASSUME that it was my post simply makes me wonder if
> there isn't some prejudice about me lurking in there, but that's something
> I can do nothing about

I think you're writing styles are similar and that may have caused Tia some
confusion. FoxgloveStusio and you both use similar sentance structure and
word choices. (At least to my untrained eye!)
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2801
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know if this is to Joyce or to someone else, but I want to thank you for the digest.  It s a lot easier to read this than all of the separate entries.
messages.messageBody:
I don't know if this is to Joyce or to someone else, but I want to thank you
for the digest. It's a lot easier to read this than all of the separate
entries. Thank you, too, for including the one I sent in the Digest #2800,
#6. I'm sure I will get more involved as time passes.

Brenda Rose

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2801
messages.msgSnippet: ... right ... name at the end of my posts. Foxglovestudio@aol.com doesn t and that s where the confusion came from. ... if there isn t some prejudice about me
messages.messageBody:
> Excuse me, but the post you are referring to was not mine. I haven't
> > expressed any opinion about it either.
> >
> > Yol
>
> << THERE you are.. LOL.. I already pointed that out.. I was hoping I was
right
> and you didnt have some "other identity" on this group.. :-) >>
>
> No, I have no other "identity" here nor anywhere, and I always write my
name at the end of my posts. Foxglovestudio@... doesn't and that's where
the confusion came from.
> Now, why would someone ASSUME that it was my post simply makes me wonder
if there isn't some prejudice about me lurking in there, but that's
something I can do nothing about. Nor care much about either, for that
matter... ;-)
>
> Yol
> (back to lurk mode for now)

Sorry Yol. That was my mistake. I got mixed up between Blue Lotus and
Foxglove Studios. No predudice against you at all, Yol. Now would the real
Foxglove Studios please stand up? Now that I know you aren't Yol, I'd like
to be reminded as to who you are.
Tia

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2801
messages.messageBody:
<<

Excuse me, but the post you are referring to was not mine. I haven't
> expressed any opinion about it either.
>
> Yol

<< THERE you are.. LOL.. I already pointed that out.. I was hoping I was right
and you didnt have some "other identity" on this group.. :-) >>

No, I have no other "identity" here nor anywhere, and I always write my name at the end of my posts. Foxglovestudio@... doesn't and that's where the confusion came from.
Now, why would someone ASSUME that it was my post simply makes me wonder if there isn't some prejudice about me lurking in there, but that's something I can do nothing about. Nor care much about either, for that matter... ;-)

Yol
(back to lurk mode for now)
